entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bissett

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
